Data: Toss: New Zealand have won the toss and will bat. I'll have the team news shortly ...
Lee to Fleming, no run bang on the money straightaway, pitches on a good length on middle and off stump, Fleming waits for it on the back foot and defends on the off side
Lee to Fleming, no run Fierce and fast and that climbed on Fleming from a good length, he lets it go just outside the off stump and Gilchrist takes it above his head
Lee to Fleming, no run Banged in short on leg and middle into Fleming's rib cage, 145khm, Fleming fends it to the leg side, off the glove not the bat
Lee to Fleming, no run Pitches on a perfect length on off stump and beats Fleming for pace
Lee to Fleming, no run on target yet again, Lee is hitting a superb length, Fleming defends on the back foot
Lee to Fleming, 1 run New Zealand are away, Fleming edges one outside off stump wide of the man at second slip, far from convincing but New Zealand will take it
Bracken to Fleming, no run pitches outside off stump, angling into the left hander and moving away from him off the pitch, Fleming lets it go
Bracken to Fleming, no run left alone again outside off stump, Bracken is getting it to move aay from the left-hander quite nicely
Bracken to Fleming, no run Fleming gives Bracken the charge, he's no where near the ball and ends up fending at it and gets comprehensively beaten by the away movement
Bracken to Fleming, no run Fleming's wiser this time and lets one go outside the off stump
Bracken to Fleming, FOUR runs shot, first convincing one from Fleming this morning, that was pitched far too full and Fleming met it on the half-volley and creamed it though covers for four
Bracken to Fleming, no run good comeback from Bracken, pitched that just short of a length and drew Fleming forward, driven to mid-off
Lee to Astle, no run short and wide outside off stump, Astle takes a look and decides he wants nothing to do with it
Lee to Astle, no run shortish length outside off stump, this time Astle goes after it and gives it a real whack, Symonds dives to his left at cover and fields it with one hand, superb stuff
Lee to Astle, no run oh yes, a play and miss, Lee bowled that full and fast and drew Astle into the drive, the ball moved off the pitch away from the right hander and whizzed past the outside edge

Lee to Astle, OUT caught! Lee pitched that short of a length and outside off stump, Astle waited for it and tried to cut it, his feet didn't move at all and he ended up getting a huge nick through to Gilchrist, Lee deserved a wicket, he's been outstanding today
Lee to Marshall, no run pitches on a good length and shapes away from the right-hander, Marshall begins to play at it but pulls his bat out of the way
Lee to Marshall, no run 152kmh, full and fast angling into the right-hander, pitching on off stump and moving away off the pitch, Marhsall is beaten all ends up as he tries to drive
Bracken to Fleming, no run left alone outside the off stump, excellent length from Bracken, not allowing Fleming to come forward and not giving him the time to play back
Bracken to Fleming, no run nagging line and length outside off stump, Fleming gets his front foot forward and shoulders arms
Bracken to Fleming, no run defended on the off side, that kicked off a good length and Fleming defended it high on the bat
Bracken to Fleming, no run pitches just outside off stump and moves away from the left-hander, Fleming lets it go
Bracken to Fleming, no run and again, Fleming's being rather cautious this morning, choosing to leave a lot of deliveries
Bracken to Fleming, 1 run fullish ball outside offf and Fleming throws his bat at it trying to flay it through covers, the ball hits the thick outside edge and flies through point

Lee to Fleming, 1 run pitches short of a length on leg and middle and angles across Fleming who doesn't know much about whats happening at the moment, he fends at it and the ball hits the top of the bat and flies over slips

Lee to Marshall, OUT Lee has another one, brilliant pace bowling, Lee pitches it on a perfect length and seams it away from the right hander off the pitch, Marhsall plays back and pokes at it, the ball kisses the outside edge and Gilchrist does the rest
Lee to Taylor, no run full and fast on off and middle stump, Taylor meets it with a straight bat and defends back to the bowler

Lee to Taylor, no run this one beats the outside edge, Lee pitches it short of a length, Taylor plunged his front foot forward when he should have just played back and let it go, the ball moves away from him off the pitch and beats the outside edge
Lee to Taylor, no run Lee is cranking it up now, that was 155.5kmh, Lee let it rip outside off stump, Taylor chased it and tried to thump it through covers and was beaten
Lee to Taylor, no run outstanding, Lee bowls thsi just short of a length and shaping away from the right-hander, Taylor fends outside the off stump but doesn't get near it
Bracken to Fleming, no run pitches on a good length outside off, Fleming lets it go
Bracken to Fleming, no run Fleming lets it go again outside off stump
Bracken to Fleming, no run hat-trick of left-alones, this one's on a perfect length and shaping away from the left-hander

Bracken to Fleming, no run a touch fuller from Bracken this time, Fleming drives but doesn't time it well, Hussey runs across from mid-off and does the fielding, no run and the pressure is inching upwards
Bracken to Fleming, no run a touch short but but it's not wide enough to cut, Fleming tries to force it past point but gets beaten
Bracken to Fleming, no run defended on the off side, Fleming's stuck in the mire at the moment, unable to gather any sort of momentum
Lee to Taylor, no run fullish ball outside off stump, Taylor thumps it hard into the ground and to Hussey at cover, the crowd get all excited because they think its a catch
Lee to Taylor, no run on a good length outside off stump, Taylor gets forward and drives to cover

Lee to Taylor, no run pitches short of a length outside off stump and moves away from Taylor who plays back and pushes at it, the ball beats the outside edge like it has done so many times this morning

Lee to Taylor, 4 leg byes four leg-byes, Lee banged that short and into Taylor's body, he moved across in a hurry and tried to fend it down, the ball beat him and thudded into the thigh pad and flew wide off Gilchrist for four
Lee to Taylor, no run fullish ball on middle and leg stump, driven to mid-on
Lee to Taylor, (no ball) short of a length and wide out side off stump, Taylor frees his arms and gives it an almighty thump, Clarke dives to his left at point and saves a certain boundary
Lee to Taylor, 1 run driven hard back to the bowler, the ball bounces off Lee's hand and they run a single
Bracken to Taylor, no run pitches short of a length on middle stump angling across the right-hander, punched off the back foot to cover
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run fullish ball on middle and leg, Taylor clips it off his pads wide off Stuart clark at mid-on, they take a single
Bracken to Fleming, no run short and wide outside off stump, Fleming cuts crisply but cannot beat Michael Clarke at point
Bracken to Fleming, 1 run full ball angling into the pads, flicked behind square for a single

Bracken to Taylor, no run angles across the right-hander, picthes outside off stump and shapes away from the bat, Taylor pushes forward at it and gets beaten, Bracken had been getting it to swing into the right-hander until now, he's getting it to move away also
Bracken to Taylor, no run and again, impeccable bowling, picthes outside off, moves away and beats Taylor's defence

Lee to Fleming, 3 runs pitche sa touch too short outside off stump, Fleming stands tall on the back foot, lets the ball come to him and pierces the gap at cover point to perfection, he's timed that superbly and that would have been four if not for a superb bit of fielding from Clarke and Symonds on the fence
Lee to Taylor, 4 leg byes strays down leg side this time and the ball clips the pads and runs down to the fence for four more leg byes
Lee to Taylor, FOUR runs sublime shot, Lee bowls it too fulla nd outside off stump, Taylor plants his foot forward and slams it through covers for four more, easily the shot of the day so far
Lee to Taylor, FOUR runs and he goes one better! this wasn't as full as the previous one but Taylor used the width to free his arms and slash it through point, superb shot
Lee to Taylor, no run driven back to Lee, that was timed really well but Lee got down in time to save runs, Taylor is looking really good out there
Lee to Taylor, no run pitches on a good length on off and middle, driven to mid-on
Bracken to Fleming, no run pitches short of a length on off stump, tucks Fleming up and hits him on the thigh pad
Bracken to Fleming, no run fuller length just outside off stump, Fleming gets forward and drives to cover, he timed that rather well, just needs to find the gap
Bracken to Fleming, no run short of a length on off stump, Fleming committed himself on the front foot, found that he was early on the shot and defended on the off side
Bracken to Fleming, no run pitches short of a length outside off stump, Fleming lashes it at point where Cameron White dives full length to his right and brings off a superb save
Bracken to Fleming, no run Bracken changes his pace and beats Fleming with the slower ball
Bracken to Fleming, no run pitches on a good length on off stump, Fleming plays half forward and defends towards point
McGrath to Taylor, no run hits the McGrath length with the first ball, the batsman lets it go

McGrath to Taylor, FOUR runs shot! What a player Taylor could turn out to be, that was just short of a length just outside off stump, Taylor plays the square drive wide of Symonds at covera nd finds the fence
McGrath to Taylor, no run clever comeback, McGrath bowls that fuller and faster, Taylor lashes at it and gets beaten, he just needs to keep his composure here
McGrath to Taylor, 1 run banged in short on middle and leg stump, Taylor swivels and pulls down to fine leg
McGrath to Fleming, no run pitche son middle and off and moves away from the left-hander, Fleming defends on the back foot but the ball sneaks past the outside edge
McGrath to Fleming, no run fuller ball on off stump, Fleming gets forward and confidently defends to cover
Bracken to Taylor, no run Pitches on a good length on off stump, angling across the right hander, Taylor gets forward and defends
Bracken to Taylor, no run left alone outside off stump
Bracken to Taylor, 1 run Pitches on leg and middle, Taylor flicks off his pads down to fine leg
Bracken to Fleming, no run pitches on off stump on a good length, moves a fraction off the pitch away from the left-hander, just enough to beat the outside edge
Bracken to Fleming, no run and again, outstanding stuff from Bracken who moves it away from the bat yet again and beats Fleming
Bracken to Fleming, no run defended on the front foot
McGrath to Taylor, no run
McGrath to Taylor, 1 run
McGrath to Fleming, no run Pitches just outside off stump and cuts back sharply into Fleming who gets hit on the pad, Gilchrist dives acrobatically to his left and takes it one-handed
McGrath to Fleming, no run Pitches just outside off stump and cuts back sharply into Fleming who gets hit on the pad, Gilchrist dives acrobatically to his left and takes it one-handed
McGrath to Fleming, 1 run Fuller ball on middle and leg stump, Fleming leans forward and drives to mid-on for one
McGrath to Taylor, no run Pitches outside off stump and moves away, Taylor lets it go

Clark to Fleming, OUT He strikes first ball! Good length outside off stump, Fleming tries to loft it over the off side, he was not to the pitch of the ball and he hit it high on the bat to Hussey at mid-off, who takes an easy catch
Clark to Taylor, no run Peter Fulton is the new batsman, he?TMs at the non-striker?TMs end because the batsmen crossed before the catch was taken.
Clark to Taylor, no run Good length on off stump, Taylor leans forward and drives to mid-off
Clark to Taylor, no run Hits a good length outside off stump yet again, Taylor defends on the front foot on the off side
Clark to Taylor, no run Fuller length on off stump, Taylor times the drives nicely but can?TMt beat mid-off
Clark to Taylor, no run Good length once again, the batsman drives to cover and Clark completes a wicket maiden in his first over
McGrath to Fulton, no run banged in short, Fulton ducks under it
McGrath to Fulton, no run pitches on a good length just outside off stump, the length draws Fulton out into the drive and the ball moves a shade away to beat the outside edge
McGrath to Fulton, FOUR runs banged in short again and Fulton spots it early, he rocks back and pulls it to the midwicket fence
McGrath to Fulton, no run defended to midwicket on the front foot
McGrath to Fulton, 1 run pitches on a good length on off stump, dabbed short of midwicket for a single
McGrath to Taylor, 1 run pitched a fraction short on middle and leg, pulled behind square for one
Clark to Taylor, no run
Clark to Taylor, no run
Clark to Taylor, FOUR runs
Clark to Taylor, no run
Clark to Taylor, no run
Clark to Taylor, FOUR runs dropped a fraction short and Taylor latches on to it and pulls it over midwicket for four
McGrath to Fulton, no run pitche son a good length on off stump, defended on the off side
McGrath to Fulton, (no ball) McGrath over-steps, the batsman defends on the back foot
McGrath to Fulton, no run defended to point on the back foot
McGrath to Fulton, no run pitches on a good length on off stump, defended back to the bowler on the back foot
McGrath to Fulton, no run defended to point on the back foot
McGrath to Fulton, no run excellent ball, that pitches on a good length and nips back off the seam, Fulton is late on the shot and the ball cuts him in half
McGrath to Fulton, no run short of a length ball outside off stump, the batsman has a swish at it but gets beaten

Clark to Taylor, OUT Clark gets another! Pitches short of a length on off stump, Taylor throws his bat at it and tries to heave it down the ground, he gets a lot of height on it but not the distance, Hussey back-pedals from mid-off and takes a well-judged catch
Clark to Fulton, no run
Clark to Fulton, no run
Clark to Fulton, no run
Clark to Fulton, 1 run pitches short of a length outside off stump, the batsman runs it down to third man for a single
Clark to McMillan, 1 run pitches a touch fuller on middle and leg stump, the batsman works it behind square leg for a single
McGrath to McMillan, no run pitches on a good length on off and middle, McMillan plays back and defends on the leg side
McGrath to McMillan, no run excellent line and length from McGrath, McMillan defends towards cover
McGrath to McMillan, no run pitches just outside off stump and cuts back into the right-hander, McMillan gets cramped for room and the ball hits the egde and drops down at his toes
McGrath to McMillan, no run pitches just outside off stump, forcing the batsman to play at it, the extra bounc eand the away movement beats the outside edge
McGrath to McMillan, no run
McGrath to McMillan, no run once again the extra bounce beats McMillan, McGrath completes a maiden over
Clark to Fulton, no run full and in the channel outside off stum, drawing the batsman forward and the away movement beatsn the bat
Clark to Fulton, no run short of a length on off stump, Fulton gets right behind the line and defends
Clark to Fulton, no run defended back to the bowler
Clark to Fulton, 1 run pushed uppishly into covers for a single
Clark to McMillan, no run slower ball on a good length just outside off stump, the batsman waits for it and defends to the off side
Clark to McMillan, no run McMillan goes for broke! He moves away and charges down the track trying to heave it over the leg side, the ball hits the inside edge and crashes into his pad
McGrath to Fulton, no run defended on the off side on the back foot
McGrath to Fulton, no run whats going on here?? that pitched well outside off stump and fulton tried to turn it through leg side, the ball moved away from him and beat the edge
McGrath to Fulton, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot
McGrath to Fulton, 3 runs fullish ball on off stump, Fulton leans forward and caresses it through covers, Hussey gives chase and does a magnificent job of pulling it in just inside the fence
McGrath to McMillan, no run pitches on a good length and jags back into McMillan who gets cramped for room and beaten

McGrath to McMillan, no run pitches short of a length outside off stump, McMillan has a swish and it and edged it to Gilchrist, and McGrath gets his man! or does he? The umpire says not out and McMillan gets a lucky break
Clark to Fulton, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Clark to Fulton, 3 runs pitches full on middle and leg stump, Fulton lofts it over mid-on
Clark to McMillan, no run pitches short of a length and jags back into McMillan who gets hit on the pad, Clark goes up in appeal but to no avail
Clark to McMillan, no run pitches on a good length and jags back into McMillan who gets hit on the body
Clark to McMillan, SIX runs what a shot, audacity at its best! McMillan charges down the track to a short ball and flat bats it high and handsomely over the long off boundary
Clark to McMillan, no run left alone outside off stump
Lee to Fulton, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump, Fulton has a lame poke at it outside off stump and the ball beats the outside edge, Lee picks up where he left off
Lee to Fulton, 1 run a touch too short and wide outside off stump, Fulton stands on the back foot and punches through covers

Lee to McMillan, no run beaten again outside the off stump, this is becomign too easy for Australia, Lee bowls that in the channel outside off stump and McMillan fends at it as the ball fizzes past his outside edge
Lee to McMillan, no run defended on the back foot to the off side
Lee to McMillan, no run slower ball outside off stump, McMillan pulls his bat away at the last moment
Lee to McMillan, no run Pitches on a good length outside off stump, McMillan shoulders arms
Symonds to Fulton, 1 run a touch too short outside off stump, punched off the back foot in front of point for a single
Symonds to McMillan, 1 run drifting on to the pads this time, flicked through square leg for one more
Symonds to Fulton, 1 leg bye fired into the pads yet again, the ball runs to short fine leg for a leg bye, Gilchrist gives chase
Symonds to McMillan, no run bowled fuller and faster on off stump, defended on the off side
Symonds to McMillan, 1 run swept to square leg for a single
Symonds to Fulton, no run pitches on off stump and turns into middle, Fulton plays back and defends to midwicket
Lee to McMillan, 1 wide banged in very short outside off stump, McMillan swerves out of the way, wide called
Lee to McMillan, no run short of a length outside off stump, McMillan doesn't play a shot and lets it go
Lee to McMillan, no run the bouncer once again, McMillan lets it go
Lee to McMillan, no run full ball angling into the right-hander, McMillan gets his foot forward and defends back to the bowler
Lee to McMillan, 1 run short ball outside off stump, McMillan cuts hard at Clarke at point who allows a single through a rare fumble
Lee to Fulton, no run defended on the off side on the front foot
Lee to Fulton, no run full and fast outside off stump, Fulton shoulders arms and lets it go
Symonds to McMillan, 1 run Turned off the pads to short fine leg
Symonds to Fulton, 1 run Drifting on to the pads yet again, whipped down to fine leg for a single
Symonds to McMillan, no run The attempted faster ball slips down leg side
Symonds to McMillan, 1 wide
Symonds to McMillan, no run Defended back to the bowler
Symonds to McMillan, 3 runs Full ball outside off stump, driven through deep cover
Symonds to Fulton, 1 run Driven down the ground to long-on for a single
Clark to Fulton, no run full ball in the channel outside off stump, Fulton has a swish at it and misses
Clark to Fulton, 2 runs flicked off the pads to deep midwicket for two more
Clark to Fulton, no run defended back to the bowler on the front foot
Clark to Fulton, OUT Gotcha! Fulton perishes. Short of length, outside the off stumpm it goes straight on and Fulton plays a nothing shot, a lame push and steers it straight to Hayden at first slip.
Clark to McCullum, no run in the zone outside off, left alone
Clark to McCullum, no run fullish, just outside off stump, he leans forward, pushes it out to cover region
Symonds to McMillan, 1 run floated on the middle stump, McMillan works it to through midwicket
Symonds to McCullum, no run
Symonds to McCullum, 1 wide slips down leg side, tried to tickle it around the corner, doesn't get a touch
Symonds to McCullum, no run on the off and middle stump line, whipped past square-leg
Symonds to McCullum, 2 runs
Symonds to McCullum, no run
Symonds to McCullum, no run
Clark to McMillan, no run in the channel outside of the off stump, left alone
Clark to McMillan, 2 runs fullish, well outside the off stump, he reaches forward and drills it through square
Clark to McMillan, no run in the channel outside the off stump, left alone

Clark to McMillan, (no ball) FOUR runs oh ho! misfield at mid-off and it is a four. And would you believe it it was Ponting who misfielded. He is mortal after all. McMillan charged out to Clark and drilled a powerful drive straight at Ponting and the ball slips through his fingers.
Clark to McMillan, no run
Clark to McMillan, no run outside the off stump, left alone
Clark to McMillan, no run
Symonds to McCullum, 3 runs fullish, on the leg side, shovelled away to deep midwicket, Hussey gets across to his left and makes a good sliding stop
Symonds to McMillan, no run on the middle stump line, turned to midwicket
Symonds to McMillan, 1 leg bye drifting on to the pads, McMillan tries to work it to on side, and it runs off the pads
Symonds to McCullum, no run around off stump line, punched to cover
Symonds to McCullum, no run
Symonds to McCullum, 1 run fullish, on the leg and middle, worked to deep midwicket
Clark to McCullum, 1 run short of a length ball wide outside off stump, cut down to third man for a single
Clark to McMillan, FOUR runs short of a length again and McMillan sees the width on offer and tries to cut, he gets an edge over first slip and collects four to third man
Clark to McMillan, 1 run driven to deep cover for a single
Clark to McCullum, no run pitches on a good length and angles into McCullum who closes the face and plays it to midwicket
Clark to McCullum, SIX runs outstanding pick-up shot, Clark bowled that full outsie off stumpa nd McCullum gets forward and hits on the up and over extracover for a massive six
Clark to McCullum, no run defended on the off side
Symonds to McMillan, 1 wide strays down leg side, wide called
Symonds to McMillan, 1 run Symonds is bowling medium pace now and drifts that on to the pads, flicked behind square for one
Symonds to McCullum, no run Defended to midwicket on the back foot
Symonds to McCullum, no run
Symonds to McCullum, no run
Symonds to McCullum, no run Pushed to midwicket on the front foot
Symonds to McCullum, no run pitches on a good length just outside off stump, it angles into middle, defended to midwicket
McGrath to McMillan, no run McMillan charges down the track and backs away to make room, McGrath sees him coming and bowls the bouncer to beat the batsman
McGrath to McMillan, no run McGrath bowls another bouncer and McMillan swerves out of the way
McGrath to McMillan, no run another short ball and this time McMillan tries to pull but gets beaten

McGrath to McMillan, FOUR runs full ball this time and McMillan gets forward and crashes it through extra cover, Symonds dives full length to his right, Ponting dives full length to his left, the ball beats them both and races to the fence
McGrath to McMillan, no run
McGrath to McMillan, no run short of a length ball on off stump, McMillan plays back and defends on the off side
Symonds to McCullum, 1 wide fired down leg side, wide called, gilchrist makes a sharp save to prevent more runs
Symonds to McCullum, no run better line this time, on off and middle, driven back to the bowler on the back foot
Symonds to McCullum, 1 run worked off the pads behind square for a single
Symonds to McMillan, no run
Symonds to McMillan, FOUR runs short of a length on off stump, McMillan tries to turn it on the leg side and gets a leading edge that beats short third man for four
Symonds to McMillan, 1 run worked off the pads behind square for a single
Symonds to McCullum, 1 run pushed short of midwicket for another single to end the over

McGrath to McCullum, OUT and he's successful with his first ball! that pitched short of alength just outside off stump, McCullum moved across his stumps and got hit on the pads, the Australians go up in appeal and the umpire agrees, that might have struck him marginally outside the line of off stump
McGrath to Vettori, no run short of a length ball on off and middle, Vettori stands tall and defends back to the bowler
McGrath to Vettori, no run defended on the off side on the back foot
McGrath to Vettori, no run slower ball outside off stump, it pitches outside off stump and angles across the left-hander, Vettori lets it go
McGrath to Vettori, no run Defended on the leg side on the back foot
McGrath to Vettori, 1 run Fuller ball outside off stump, Vettori jams his bat down at the last moment and collects a single wide of point
Symonds to Vettori, no run pitches just outside off stump and swings back into the left hander after it passes the batsman, left alone by Vettori
Symonds to Vettori, no run fullish length on middle and off stump, defended back to the bowler
Symonds to Vettori, 2 runs full length outside off stump, Vettori swats it down the ground and times it well enough to get two
Symonds to Vettori, 3 runs clever shot, Vettori waited for it outside off stump and dabbed it down to third man, Stuart Clark runs across, dives and saves one run
Symonds to McMillan, no run Defended on the off side on the back foot
Symonds to McMillan, 1 run drifts on to the pads, flicked through square leg for one to end the over
Clark to McMillan, no run good length ball on off stump, defended on the off side
Clark to McMillan, no run McMillan takes a step down and backs away to make room, Clark spots him and digs it short, McMillan tries to cut but gets beaten
Clark to McMillan, 2 runs superb placement, chips it straight down the ground, McGrath picks it up just inside the fence
Clark to McMillan, 1 run angled behind point for a single

Clark to Vettori, OUT Vettori's clever shot wasn't so clever this time, knowing that Vettori likes to run it down to third man, Ponting stationed himself at a wide slip, Clark bowled it short of a length outside off stump and Vettori opened the face and ran the ball straight to Ponting who took a sharp catch at face height
Clark to Franklin, no run Clark greets him with a bouncer, Franklin takes evasive action by ducking under it
Bracken to McMillan, FOUR runs and McMillan welcomes him by thumping him through extra cover for four, powerful shot and most of the power was generated in the wrists
Bracken to McMillan, 1 run carved down to long on for a single, Ponting has protection in the deep now
Bracken to Franklin, 1 run Pitches on off stump and moves away from the left-hander, the ball kisses Franklin's edge and runs down to third man
Bracken to McMillan, 1 run Bracken fires in the Yorker and McMillan hurries to get his bat down in the nick of time, the ball hits the inside edge and runs down to fine leg
Bracken to Franklin, no run Slower ball, defended to cover
Bracken to Franklin, 2 runs another slowish ball but this time he drifts on to the pads, worked behind square on the leg side
Clark to McMillan, 1 run Clark tries to find the blockhole but it ends up as a low full toss, McMillan pushes it down the ground for one
Clark to Franklin, 1 run fullish length on off stump, Franklin drives to mid-off for a quick single
Clark to McMillan, 1 run short of a length on middle stump, tucked off his hips on the leg side for one
Clark to Franklin, 1 run bowled short of a length from wide of the crease from round the wicket, Franklin nudges it to midwicket for a single

Clark to McMillan, 2 runs full ball yet again, searching fror the yorker, McMillan clips the low full toss off his pads for midwicket, he scampers through for two and reaches and invaluable fifty, he's had his luck but credit for making it count!
Clark to McMillan, FOUR runs cheeky cheely, McMillan took a step or two down, Clark bowled it short but this time McMillan poked at it and ran it fine down to the third man fence
Bracken to Franklin, 1 run pitches short of a length outside off stump and angling into the left hander, Franklin waits for it and dabs it down to third man
Bracken to McMillan, 2 runs full and wide outside off stump, McMillan makes room and slaps it back past the bowler for two runs
Bracken to McMillan, 2 runs Franklin better be on his toes at the non-striker's end, McMillan thumps it again back past Bracken for two more to long off
Bracken to McMillan, 2 runs clipped over midwicket for two more, McMillan is motoring along now
Bracken to McMillan, SIX runs massive! This was always on the cards, Bracken bowls it full, McMillan gets his front foot out of the way and carts it over the fence at deep midwicket, outstanding shot
Bracken to McMillan, 1 run run down to third man for a single to end the over
White to McMillan, 1 run pitches wide outside off stump and McMillan smashes it through cover for a single
White to Franklin, 1 run fullish ball on off stump, Franklin gets to the pitch of the ball using his long reach and drives through extra cover for a single
White to McMillan, 1 run short ball and McMillan rocks back and pulls to deep backward square leg
White to Franklin, no run defended back to the bowler
White to Franklin, 2 runs Short and wide outside the left-hander's off stump, cut down to third man for two
White to Franklin, 1 run driven off the back foot for a single to sweeper cover
Symonds to Franklin, FOUR runs pitches just outside off stump on a good length, Franklin tries to run it fine but gets more of an edge down to third man for four
Symonds to Franklin, no run pushed back to the bowler on the back foot
Symonds to Franklin, 2 runs Full length on middle and leg stump, flicked to deep midwicket for a two
Symonds to Franklin, 1 run Bowled slower on a good length, Franklin waits for it and dabs it short of cover for a single
Symonds to McMillan, 2 runs Full toss on middle stump, swung over midwicket for a hastily scampered two

Symonds to McMillan, 1 run McMillan tries to heave it down the ground but gets an inside edge on to the off side, he sets off for the single, Symonds sprints to the ball, picks up, turns and shies, he misses the stumps of McMillan would have been short at the non-striker's end
Lee to McMillan, 1 run bowled short of a length on off stump, McMillan sways back and chips it down to third man for a single
Lee to Franklin, 1 run pitches short of a length just outside off, Franklin dabs it in front of point for a single, there have been 19 scoring shots in a row now
Lee to McMillan, FOUR runs that's number 20 and what a shot, he latched on to the length and smases it through covers, placed it perfectly and the ball scorched the turf before reaching the fence
Lee to McMillan, 2 runs
Lee to McMillan, no run
Lee to McMillan, no run
McGrath to Franklin, no run short of a length outside off stump, Frrankin tries to pull but misses
McGrath to Franklin, OUT short ball yet again and this time Franklin connects with the pull, he pulls it straight to Matthew Hayden at deep midwicket, Hayden hardly had to move and took an easy catch
McGrath to McMillan, 1 run McGrath tries to fire in the yorker, McMillan pushes it to cover for a single
McGrath to Gillespie, no run slower ball dipping into Gillespie, defended back to the bowler on the front foot
McGrath to Gillespie, no run short ball and Gillespie tries to...ummm..well I think he tried to pul, but he got his head out of the way and took evasive action in the end
McGrath to Gillespie, no run banged in short again, Gillespie backs away and cuts it in the air down to third man, McMillan declines the single because he wants the strike
Lee to McMillan, no run bouncer and McMillan ducks under it
Lee to McMillan, no run another short ball, McMillan tries to back away and run it down to third man but gets beaten for pace
Lee to McMillan, 2 runs Shortish length, McMillan backs away and Lee follows him, McMillan plays a half pull shot to deep midwicket for two more
Lee to McMillan, SIX runs that's six, and what a shot! Lee dropped that shot and wide, McMillan freed his arms and carved that over point for maximum runs
Lee to McMillan, 1 run tucked down to fine leg for a single

Lee to Gillespie, 2 byes fast and furious, Gillespie backs away and Lee follows him with the short ball, the batsman evades it and Gilchrist collects, he tries to affect a run out and they concedes over throws to mid-on, Lee isn't happy at all
McGrath to McMillan, no run defended on the leg side

McGrath to McMillan, OUT that's the end of a pugnacious innings! McGrath bowls a full toss, McMillan tries to hoick it down the ground and skies it back to the bowler, McGrath takes a simple catch, there's a bit of confusion as to whether the full toss was above waist height, McMillan hangs around for a bit but has to go in the end
McGrath to Mason, 1 run McGrath gives him a short one to say Hello! Mason swings it through midwicket for one
McGrath to Gillespie, no run full ball outside off stump, Gillespie backs away to smash it but gets beaten
McGrath to Gillespie, no run full ball on off and middle stump, Gillespie backs away and squeezes it through the off side for one
McGrath to Gillespie, no run short ball on off and middle stump, the batsman backs away and tries to force it through the off side but doesn't make contact
Lee to Mason, 1 run tucked through midwicket for a single
Lee to Gillespie, no run pitches on a good length slanting into middle and leg, gillespie baks away far down leg side and tries to slash it through the off, he doesn't make contact
Lee to Gillespie, (no ball) FOUR runs Lee oversteps in trying to find the blockhole and the batsman gets the toe end of the bat on the ball and manages to get four down to fine leg
Lee to Gillespie, 1 run Good length ball just outside off stump, Gillespie backs away and cuts for a single through point
Lee to Mason, no run fuller length on off stump, Mason stands his ground and defends back to the bowler
Lee to Mason, 1 run steered down to third man for a single
Lee to Gillespie, no run full length on off stump, Gillespie backs away and swats it to Ponting at cover
Bracken to Mason, 1 run Mason chips it over extra cover for a single
Bracken to Gillespie, 1 run full toss outside off stump, Gillespie tries to hit over the leg side but gets an outside edge down to third man
Bracken to Mason, 2 leg byes the yorker hits Gillespie on his toe, there's a half-hearted appeal for lbw but that was missing leg, they run two leg byes to third man

Bracken to Mason, OUT that's the end of that, Bracken bowls the effort ball, just a bit quicker and in the blockhole, Mason plays all around it and has his stumps re-arranged, New Zealand are bowled out for 218

Australia have done well to dismiss New Zealand for 218 after losing the toss. McGrath was impeccable with figures of 3 for 24 off his ten overs. Clark was more expensive but he did pick up four important wickets. McMillan led the way for New Zealand with 89 off 87 balls and it was his effort that took New Zealand to a score they can hope to defend if they bowl well. I'll be back in half an hour for the

We're moments away from the start of Australia's reply. New Zealand have taken the field as have Adam Gilchrist and Matthew Hayden. Australia need 219 to win at 4.38 runs per over. The start will be crucial. England took early wickets against Australia on Friday and gave them a real scare. Michael Mason too will want cheap wickets with the new ball. He's bowling from over the wicket to Gilchrist with tw
Mason to Gilchrist, 1 wide pitches the first one outside leg stump and that's a wide down leg side, not the start New Zealand would have wanted
Mason to Gilchrist, 1 run pitches on leg stump again, Gilchrist works it off his pads through midwicket for a single to get off the mark
Mason to Hayden, no run fullish length on off stump, Hayden gets forward and drives to cover
Mason to Hayden, (no ball) good length from Mason, he pitches that on off stump, Hayden comes forward and gets squared up and gets an outside edge to point, Mason has over-stepped though
Mason to Hayden, no run pitches on middle and leg on a good length, Hayden plays on the back foot and defends to midwicket
Mason to Hayden, no run pitches short of a length on middle and off, Hayden stands on the back foot and pushes to midwicket
Mason to Hayden, no run short of a length again and tucks Hayden up on the back foot, he awkwardly fends that down on the leg side

Mason to Hayden, no run full ball on off and middle, Hayden leans into the drive and punches it hard back to the bowler, Mason does well to get down in time, he finishes a tight first over but for the extras
Franklin to Gilchrist, 1 wide he too starts with a wide down leg side, Franklin is angling the ball into gGlchrist and just strayed in line that time
Franklin to Gilchrist, 2 runs full ball on off stump, Gilchrist drives uppishly between cover and mid-off, Vettori does the fielding
Franklin to Clarke, no run full ball outside off stump, Clarke jabs down at it and gets an inside edge on to pad
Franklin to Clarke, no run good length ball outside off stump, steered to point with an open face
Franklin to Clarke, no run full ball on off and middle stump, driven hard back at the bowler, Franklin plucks it out with one hand
Franklin to Clarke, no run The bouncer to finish the over, Clarke lets it go
Mason to Hayden, no run Mason starts with a slower ball on leg stump, the ball clips Hayden's pad through to McCullum
Mason to Hayden, no run fuller ball on off stump, Hayden leans into a good-looking off drive but hits it straight to mid-off
Mason to Hayden, no run defended to mid-on on the front foot
Mason to Ponting, no run pitches on a good length in the channel outside off stump, Ponting plants his foot forward and shoulders arms
Mason to Ponting, no run pitches just outside off stump on a goo length, Ponting shoulders arms again, that's two wickets in two overs for New Zealand
Franklin to Clarke, no run defended to covers on the back foot
Franklin to Clarke, no run fullish ball angling across the right-hander, Clarke gets forward and pushes to covers

Franklin to Clarke, (no ball) Franklin over-steps and bowls a rank half-volley outside off stump, Clarke hammers it, absolutely hammers it to cover where Ross Taylor makes a superb save, that was hit very very hard
Franklin to Clarke, 1 run driven to mid-off on the front foot for a single
Franklin to Ponting, no run hits a good length on middle and off stump, angling across Ponting from over the wicket, Ponting plays back and across and defends
Franklin to Ponting, no run fuller length and that swings into Ponting a fraction after angling across him, he gets forward and defends
Franklin to Ponting, no run defended to midwicket on the front foot
Mason to Clarke, no run pitches outside off stump, Clarke lets it go and the ball cuts back late into the right-hander and passes close to off stump

Mason to Clarke, no run loud shout for lbw is turned down, that pitches on middle and Clarke moves across his stumps and tries to flick, the ball beats the bat and thuds into the pad but it was slipping down leg
Mason to Clarke, no run left alone outside off, that took off from a short length
Mason to Clarke, no run fuller ball on off stump, Clarke gets forward and drives back at the bowler, Franklin gets down in time and gets a hand on it
Mason to Clarke, no run good length ball on off and middle, Clarke gets forward and pushes to mid-on
Mason to Clarke, FOUR runs poor ball, full and wide outside off stump, Clarke gets forward, reaches out for it and drives through covers for four, that's the first boundary of the innings
Franklin to Ponting, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump, Ponting lets it go
Franklin to Ponting, no run straighter line on off and midle, Ponting waits for it, plays back and defends back to the bowler
Franklin to Ponting, no run Fuller length on off stump, Ponting gets a stride in, presents a straight bat and blocks
Franklin to Ponting, FOUR runs A fraction short, Ponting seizes on the length in a trice, he swivels into position and smashes it flat and low through midwicket for four
Franklin to Ponting, 1 run Pushed slowly back past the stumps at the non-striker's end for a very very quick single
Franklin to Clarke, no run full ball angling across Clarke who covers the line of the stumps and lets it go
Mason to Ponting, no run Pitches on a good length just outside off stump, Ponting sizes it up and decides to shoulder arms
Mason to Ponting, no run superb ball, pitches on a good length on off stump, the length draws Ponting forward and the late away movement takes the ball past the outside edge of the forward defence
Mason to Ponting, no run left alone outside off stump, Ponting was wise not to repeat his mistake twice in a row
Mason to Ponting, no run pushed to point on the front foot
Mason to Symonds, no run Mason pitches it on a good length and that takes off steeply, McCullum collects it hear his head after Symonds lets it go
Franklin to Clarke, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump, the ball angles away from the right-hander, Clarke lets it go through to McCullum
Franklin to Clarke, no run left alone again outside off stump, Clarke is watching the angle closely and gets his front foot well forward and outside the line of off stump before leaving it
Franklin to Clarke, no run defended on the front foot
Franklin to Clarke, no run left alone outside off stump
Franklin to Clarke, FOUR runs too full outside off stump, Clarke reaches out for the half-volley and thumps it through extra cover for four
Franklin to Clarke, no run Good comeback, pitches on the perfect length outside off and shapes away from Clarke who gets the foot forward and shoulders arms with a flourish of the bat
Mason to Symonds, FOUR runs what an exhibition of raw strength, Symonds pounced on the full length and blasted it over cover for a one-bounce for
Mason to Symonds, 4 leg byes he can be deft as well, Symonds glances one off his pads down to the fine leg fence for four more, but the umpire says it's leg byes
Mason to Symonds, no run defended to point on the front foot
Mason to Symonds, no run short of a length ball on off an dmiddle stump, Symonds stands up on the back foot and defends back down the pitch
Mason to Symonds, 1 run pitches on a good length and cuts back viciously into Symonds who gets hit on the pad before getting bat on it, he gets a single to point
Mason to Clarke, (no ball) FOUR runs he over-steps and sprays it down leg side, Clarke gets a tickle on it and collects four to fine leg, expensive over this
Mason to Clarke, 1 leg bye drifts down leg side and Clarke move across and plays it behind square for a single
Franklin to Clarke, no run fullish length on off stump, Clarke leans forward and drives to mid-off
Franklin to Clarke, no run pitches short of a length on middle and off, angling across the right-hander, Clarke lets it go
Franklin to Clarke, no run fuller ball on middle and leg stump, Clarke flicks it to midwicket
Franklin to Clarke, no run good length ball pitching on off stump, angling across the batsman, Clarke leans forward and defends to cover
Franklin to Clarke, no run left alone again outside off stump, Clarke is very watchful against the balls angling across him
Franklin to Clarke, no run excellent leave, that ball rose sharply from just short of a good length, Clarke watched it the whole way, dropped his wrists and let it go
Mason to Symonds, FOUR runs Far too full on off stump, Symonds leans forward and drives wide off the fielder at mid-off and times it well enough to reach the fence
Mason to Symonds, no run
Mason to Symonds, no run Defended on the back foot, Clarke thinks about the single but Symonds says NO!
Mason to Symonds, 2 runs short of a length outside off stump, guided down to fine leg for two
Mason to Symonds, no run
Mason to Symonds, no run Pitches on a good length outside off stump, Symonds watches it through to McCullum
Franklin to Clarke, no run hits a good length outside off stump and bounces sharply through to McCullum, Clarke lets it go
Franklin to Clarke, 3 runs full length on middle and leg, flicked through midwicket
Franklin to Symonds, FOUR runs short and wide outside off stump, Symnonds rocks back and cuts hard past point and the ball rockets to the fence
Franklin to Symonds, FOUR runs streaky boundary, Symonds tried to drive that but got an edge down to the third man fence
Franklin to Symonds, no run a fraction short and Symonds pulls but can't beat midwicket
Franklin to Symonds, no run defended to point on the back foot
Gillespie to Clarke, no run pitches it short of a length and wide outside off stump, Clarke lets it go and looks for the wide call, the umpire is unmoved
Gillespie to Clarke, no run good length ball on off stump that cuts back into Clarke, defended to midwicket
Gillespie to Clarke, no run Good length ball pitching just outside off and angling into Clarke's off and middle stump, Clarke gets forward and defends to cover
Gillespie to Clarke, no run tight line and length on off stump, Clarke plays right back and defends with a straight bat back to Gillespie
Gillespie to Clarke, no run on a good length but a touch wide outside off, Clarke lets it go
Gillespie to Clarke, no run defended on the front foot to covers, Gillespie finishes a tight opening over
Franklin to Symonds, 2 runs pitches on off stump and angles across Symonds who prods at it and gets a edge past first slip and down to third man for two more
Franklin to Symonds, FOUR runs full and wide outside off stump, Symonds raches out and flays it through covers for four
Franklin to Symonds, no run a fraction short and Symonds tries to pull, he makes contact but doesn't time it well
Franklin to Symonds, no run pushed to covers, the batsmen think about the single but decide against it
Franklin to Symonds, no run good length ball on off stump, Symonds chops it with the bottom edge back past the stumps
Franklin to Symonds, no run fuller ball on off stump, Symonds thumps it but can't beat mid-off
Gillespie to Clarke, no run good length ball on off stump, Clarke gets forward and defends to point
Gillespie to Clarke, no run Gillespie digs it in short and bounces sharply on Clarke who is halfway through the pull shot before deciding to abort it
Gillespie to Clarke, no run defended on the off side on the front foot
Gillespie to Clarke, no run Excellent length from Gillespie, pitching just outside off and angling it into Clarke who gets forward and defends

Gillespie to Clarke, 2 runs Dropped! What a crucial moment! Clarke tried to pull a short ball that got big on him, the resulting top edge flew high in the air to Franklin who ran in from fine leg, the ball hit the top of his fingers and forced its way through them
Gillespie to Clarke, no run left alone outside off stump
Vettori to Symonds, FOUR runs Symonds takes him on straightaway, he picks that up from outside off stump and lofts it over midwicket for a one-bounce four
Vettori to Symonds, FOUR runs Vettori drops it a fraction short and Symonds rocks back to cut it hard through cover point, Gillespie misfields on the fence for allow four
Vettori to Symonds, no run defended to cover
Vettori to Symonds, 3 runs the arm ball and Symonds cuts hard again but this time Gillespie does well on the fence to save the boundary
Vettori to Clarke, no run defended on the off side on the back foot
Vettori to Clarke, no run tossed up on middle and off stump, Clarke gets his foot well forward and defends
Gillespie to Symonds, no run pitches on a good length on off stump, Symonds plays back and defends on the off side
Gillespie to Symonds, no run that was quick from Gillespie who pitched it on a good length outside off stump, Symonds aimed to cut it but was late on the shot
Gillespie to Symonds, no run that bounced on Symonds from short of a length, he stood tall on the back foot and played it down on the off side
Gillespie to Symonds, no run Gillespie bounces Symonds who sways out of the way
Gillespie to Symonds, no run pitches just short of a length and bounces into Symonds's ribs, he plays back and fends it down on the leg side
Gillespie to Symonds, no run that surprised Symonds because it got very big on him from a good length, Symonds played back and the ball hit him on the body, Gillespie completes a maiden over
Vettori to Clarke, no run pitches on off stump, Clarke plays back and defends on the off side
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run a touch too short outside the off stump, Clarke waits for it and cuts to deep point
Vettori to Symonds, no run slower through the air on off stump, Symonds gets forward and defends awkwardly back to the bowler
Vettori to Symonds, 1 run flatter ball on off stump, played through point for a single
Vettori to Clarke, no run defended on the front foot to the leg side
Vettori to Clarke, no run tossed up on off stump, Clarke uses his feet to step down and defend back to the bowler
Gillespie to Symonds, no run Short of a length on off stump, Symonds plays back and defends to point
Gillespie to Symonds, 1 run short of a length again but this time the line is middle and leg stump, Symonds tucks it towards midwicket for a single
Gillespie to Clarke, no run fuller ball on off stump, Clarke gets forward and drives to mid-off
Gillespie to Clarke, no run pings Clarke with an excellent bouncer, Clarke hastily ducks under it leaving his bat sticking out like a periscope
Gillespie to Clarke, 1 run full ball on middle and leg stump, Clarke flicks through square leg for a single

Gillespie to Symonds, no run the plan is quite evident, they aren't giving Symonds anything full to hit, Gillespie bowls that short of a length at chest height, Symonds plays back and fends it behind square on the off side
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run a fraction too short from Vettori, Clarke plays back and turns it around the corner for a single
Vettori to Symonds, no run pitches on a good length on off stump, Symonds rocks back and forces it to cover
Vettori to Symonds, no run yorker from the spinner! Symonds looked to drive but got an inside edge on to the pad
Vettori to Hussey, no run defended on the off side on the front foot
Vettori to Hussey, no run played back to the bowler
Gillespie to Clarke, 1 wide Gillespie fires in another bouncer, Clarke lets that go and it's far too high, wide called
Gillespie to Clarke, no run good length ball pitches on off stump and angles into Clarke, defended solidly on the front foot
Gillespie to Clarke, no run good length ball on off stump, Clarke pushes it to covers on the front foot
Gillespie to Clarke, (no ball) FOUR runs the attempted yorker and Clarke drives it down the ground and times it to perfection, the ball teases the fielders all the way to the fence
Gillespie to Clarke, no run defended on the front foot back to the bowler
Gillespie to Clarke, 3 runs another attempted yorker is pushed down the ground by Clarke, he hasn't timed this as well as the previous time and Astle and Vettori do the ole one-two to save the four
Gillespie to Hussey, no run pitches just outside off stump and angles away from the left-hander, Hussey lets it go
Gillespie to Hussey, no run left alone outside the off stump, that was rather wide and Hussey wanted nothing to do with it
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run pitches a fraction short angling into off stump, Clarke rocks back and forces it through cover point for a single
Vettori to Hussey, FOUR runs too short, dreadful ball from Vettori and Hussey gets into position, pulls hard and helps himself to a boundary
Vettori to Hussey, no run defended to cover on the front foot
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run pitches on middle and spins across Hussey who tucks it behind square leg for a single
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run Pushed past point on the off side for a single
Vettori to Hussey, no run tossed up on middle and off stump, Hussey goes back and defends back to Vettori
Gillespie to Clarke, 1 run full ball, Gillespie is searching for the Yorker, Clarke moves across his stumps and works it behind square for a single
Gillespie to Hussey, no run hits a good length on Hussey's off stump, the ball bounces sharply and Hussey lets it go
Gillespie to Hussey, 1 run a fraction short and this doesn't bounce as high as the previous balls, Hussey rocks back and pulls along the ground to deep midwicket
Gillespie to Clarke, no run pitches on a good length outside off stump, Clarke drops his hands and lets it go
Gillespie to Clarke, no run good length ball on off stump, Clarke leans on the front foot and defends
Gillespie to Clarke, no run Gillespie lets the bouncer rip, Clarke swerves out of the way
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run pitches on off stump, Hussey defends behind square on the leg side
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run drifted slowly through the air on off stump, Clarke dabs it short of point on the off side for a quick single
Vettori to Hussey, no run pushed through quicker on off stump, Hussey plays back and defends to cover
Vettori to Hussey, no run defended back to the bowler on the back foot
Vettori to Hussey, 1 leg bye tossed up delightfully on off stump, Hussey gets forward, the ball bounces sharply on him and hits the glove, the umpire says it's leg byes to short third man
Vettori to Clarke, no run defended on the off side on the back foot
Gillespie to Hussey, 1 run full ball on off stump, Hussey drives down the ground and though he doesn

Gillespie to Clarke, FOUR runs full ball drifting on to the pads, Clarke leans across and clips it off his pads wide of mid on, Vettori gives chase and dives to pull the ball back inside the fence, his feet touch the rope as he tries to keep it in play
Gillespie to Clarke, no run Gillespie replys with the bouncer and Clarke sways out of the way
Gillespie to Clarke, no run another short ball outside off stump, Clarke watches it through to McCullum
Gillespie to Clarke, no run pitches wide outside off stump and holds its line through to the 'keeper, Clarke lets it go
Gillespie to Clarke, no run fuller ball angling into middle stump, Clarke moves across and glances it to midwicket
Vettori to Hussey, no run floated through just short of a a length outside off stump, Hussey plays back and defends
Vettori to Hussey, no run Defended on the back foot on the leg side, that spun back quite sharply into Hussey
Vettori to Hussey, no run That was the straighter ball, Hussey played for the turn and got and outside edge to short third man
Vettori to Hussey, 2 runs Swept to deep backward square leg for a single
Vettori to Hussey, FOUR runs superb shot, Hussey spotted the length early, got down on one knee and played the slog sweep from outside off stump to send the ball soaring in front of midwicket
Vettori to Hussey, no run defended on the front foot to the off side
Astle to Clarke, 1 run pushed in front of point for a single
Astle to Hussey, 1 run drifting on to the pads, Hussey clips it down to fine leg for a single
Astle to Clarke, no run defended to midwicket on the back foot
Astle to Clarke, 1 run Short of a length on off stump, Clarke drives to mid-on and sets off at rapid pace for the single

Astle to Hussey, 3 runs short of a length ball outside off stump, Hussey eases it off the back foot through covers, theya re brilliant between the wickets and manage three runs before Fleming's return comes in
Astle to Clarke, 1 run pushed to mid-on for another rapid single to end the over
Vettori to Clarke, no run quicker delivery, defended outside the off stump
Vettori to Clarke, no run forced away towrads cover

Vettori to Clarke, no run big mix-up going for the single, first the throw came back to the keeper, but Marshall ran across, grabbed the ball and it was relayed to Vettori, who had all the time in the world but failed to break the stumps with the ball in his hand, replays confirm that the ball slipped away at just the last second before Vettori's hand touch the wood. Big mess
Vettori to Clarke, no run tossed up outside the off stump, defended back-foot
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run driven wide of the fielder at cover
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run short ball and Hussey pulls it away through midwicket for an easy single
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run starts off with a short ball and Hussey pulls it away straight to the fielder at deep midwicket
McMillan to Clarke, 1 run forced away towards short cover and they think of a single but decide against it, shy at the strikers end fails to hit the target and the ball races away to fine leg
McMillan to Hussey, no run driven straight to the fielder at mid-off
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run taps it well wide of the fielder at point and they scamper through for a single
McMillan to Clarke, 1 run short ball outside the off stump and the late cut finds the fielder at third man
McMillan to Hussey, no run good length delivery on the middle and off stump line, Hussey gets forward and defends it down
Franklin to Clarke, no run good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
Franklin to Clarke, no run big inside edge and that's dropped! Clarke was driving away from his body and was beaten by the shape in. McCullum was standing up but it was a fairly easy chance
Franklin to Clarke, 1 run punched down to mid-on and they sprint across for a single
Franklin to Hussey, no run in the channel outside the off stump, defended watcfully
Franklin to Hussey, 2 runs fuller length delivery outside the off stump and Hussey square drives it through point
Franklin to Hussey, no run good length and cutting back in, defended straight back to the bowler
McMillan to Clarke, no run short of a length and wide outside off stump, Clarke cuts but can't beat point
McMillan to Clarke, 1 run fuller length on off and middle, pushed down the ground for a single
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run slower ball on middle and off stump, Hussey waits for it and guides it past point for a single
McMillan to Clarke, 1 run good length on off stump, Clarke leans forward and pushes it in front of point for a single
McMillan to Hussey, no run dabbed to point on the front foot, clarke wants the single but Hussey sends him back
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run flicked off the pads to square leg for a single to end the over
Franklin to Hussey, 1 run good length ball on off stump, Hussey takes two steps down and drives to mid-off, they run a quick single
Franklin to Clarke, 2 runs wide outside off stump, Clarke cuts it over point to third man
Franklin to Clarke, 2 runs pitches on middle and off stump, Clarke pushes forward and gets an inside edge behind square leg for a single
Franklin to Clarke, no run pitches on a good length on off stump, Clarke gets his front foot forward and defends

Franklin to Clarke, 1 run short of a length ball on middle and off, Clarke plays back, drops it short on the of side and scampers through for a single to bring up his fifty, he's made excellent use of that let off by Franklin, well played
Franklin to Hussey, no run defended back to the bowler on the back foot
Mason to Clarke, no run pitches on a good length just outside off stump, the ball moves a fraction away from Clarke's bat and beats the outside edge
Mason to Clarke, no run fuller length on off stump, Clarke pushes it to point on the front foot
Mason to Clarke, no run good length ball and dead straight, Clarke plays half forward and defends back to Mason
Mason to Clarke, 1 run good length ball outside off stump, Clarke tries to smash it through the off side but gets an inside edge through midwicket
Mason to Hussey, no run short of a length delivery, pitching on off stump and angling across the left hander, Hussey dabs it to point on the back foot
Mason to Hussey, no run good length ball on middle and off stump, Hussey waits for it on the back foot and pushes back to the bowler
Franklin to Clarke, no run pitches on middle and angles across Clarke who moves across his stumps and defends back to the bowler
Franklin to Clarke, FOUR runs fuller ball on off stump, Clarke gets forward and whacks it straight back at Hussey who hurries out of the way, the ball beats mid-off and races to the fence
Franklin to Clarke, no run hits a good length on middle and off, Clarke gets forward and the ball hits the pad
Franklin to Clarke, 3 runs full and wide outside off stump, Clarke makes room and lashes it over cover point, he didn't time that perfectly but he'll get three for it
Franklin to Hussey, no run fullish length angling into Hussey who drives on the up to mid off

Franklin to Hussey, no run huge huge appeal for caught behind is turned down, Franklin banged that short, Hussey shaped for a pull but missed it, the ball kissed the shoulder and McCullum took the 'catch', good decison from the umpire
Mason to Clarke, FOUR runs full ball and Clarke hammers it down the ground to the long-on fence

Mason to Clarke, FOUR runs once again! this time it's not that full but Clarke hits through the line, the ball is airborne but beats the fielder at mid-on who dives in vain to his right to take the ctach, Clarke is cashing in on the Powerplay
Mason to Clarke, 2 runs tucked behind square on the leg side
Mason to Clarke, no run
Mason to Clarke, 1 run good length ball on middle and off stump, Clarke pushes it wide of mid-on for one
Mason to Hussey, no run short ball and Hussey is extremely early on the pull shot, the ball thuds into chest, he still thinks about stealing a leg bye but decides against it
Vettori to Clarke, no run fullish ball angling into off and middle, defended on the front foot
Vettori to Clarke, FOUR runs fantastic footwork! Clarke twinkles down the track and lifts Vettori down the ground, impeccable timing and the ball screams to the fence
Vettori to Clarke, no run defended back to the bowler
Vettori to Clarke, 1 run wide outside off stump, cut to deep point
Vettori to Hussey, no run pushed quickly through the air on off stump, Hussey gets his foot forward and blocks
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run a touch too short and Hussey has the time to play back and turn it behind square for a single
Mason to Hussey, FOUR runs full ball and Hussey gives it the charge and drives, he gets a thick outside edge past McCullum and it runs down to third man for four
Mason to Hussey, no run full ball angling into Hussey from round the wicket, defended to cover point
Mason to Hussey, 1 run slower ball, it finishes as a full toss, Hussey comes down the track and pushes it to mid-off
Mason to Clarke, 1 run short of a length ball outside off stump, Clarke opens the face and runs it down to third man
Mason to Hussey, no run short and wide outside off stump, Hussey cuts but Marshall dives to his right at backward point to save runs
Mason to Hussey, 1 wide slower ball but it's mis-directed outside off stump, wide called
Mason to Hussey, no run short of a length delivery on off stump, Hussey plays back and pushes it to cover, that's the end of the final Powerplay
Vettori to Hussey, no run pushed through quickly outside off stump, Hussey lets it go
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run pushed through midwicket for a single, Fulton does the fielding
Vettori to White, no run pushed flat and fast into White from round the wicket, defended back to Vettori
Vettori to White, no run defende don the front foot back to the bowler
Vettori to White, 1 run short of a length ball outside off stump, pushed through cover point on the back foot for a single
Mason to White, no run good length ball on off stump, White gets forward and defends back to Mason
Mason to White, no run pitches just outside off stump and moves away from White who plays at it but gets beaten
Mason to White, 2 runs hits the good length outside off stump and cuts into White who plays forward and gets an outside edge past first slip to third man
Mason to White, 1 run Mason pitched that short but it hardly rose on White who tried to pull but didn't time it well through square leg
Mason to Hussey, 1 run pitches just on off stump and angles into Hussey who gets a bit of bat before the ball hits the pad
Mason to White, no run pitches wide outside off stump, White lets it go through to McCullum
Vettori to Hussey, no run Angling into the left-hander's middle stump from over the wicket, defended on the leg side
Vettori to Hussey, 1 run Driven firmly back past the bowler for a single to long-on
Vettori to White, no run the slider outside off stump, White tries to cut but gets beaten by the pace and bounce
Vettori to White, no run defended back to the bowler
Vettori to White, no run blocked on the front foot on the off side
Vettori to White, 1 run drifting into White's middle stump, White pushes forward and gets an inside edge behind square on the leg side for a single
Gillespie to White, no run bang on a good length rightaway, White gets forward and defends&
Gillespie to White, no run defended on the off side
Gillespie to Hussey, 1 run Hussey, who crossed when the ball was in the air, drives through covers for a single
Gillespie to Lee, (no ball) 1 run Gillespie over-steps! That was quick, 140khm, and in the blockhole outside off stump, Lee got an inside edge past his stumps for a single
Gillespie to Hussey, 1 run full ball on off stump, Hussey pushes it firmly to Taylor at cover who moves quickly to his right, picks up and shies at the batsman's end, had he hit, Lee was gone
Gillespie to Lee, no run short ball targeted at Lee's ribs, he plays back and fends it down with his gloves
McMillan to Hussey, FOUR runs poor ball, dropped short on leg stump, Hussey gets into position and pulls it behind square for four.
McMillan to Hussey, FOUR runs another short ball and Hussey pulls this in front of midwicket for foure more, the pressure is easing off Australia with these boundaries
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run pushed to covers for a single
McMillan to Lee, no run good length ball on off stump, Lee defends back to the bowler
McMillan to Lee, no run quicker ball from McMillan, Lee plays back and is hurried into keeping it away from his pads
McMillan to Lee, no run defended on the back foot to the leg side
Gillespie to Hussey, no run fullish ball on off and middle, defended back to Gillespie
Gillespie to Hussey, no run good length ball on off stump, Hussey drives it back to Gillespie who fields the ball and hurls it back tat the stumps
Gillespie to Hussey, no run full ball angling into middle and leg stump, Hussey clips it to mid-on
Gillespie to Hussey, 1 run fullish length outside off stump, Hussey gets forward and drives to long-off for a single
Gillespie to Lee, no run Gillespie gives Lee a bouncer, paying him back for several bouncers in the first innings, Lee ducks under it
Gillespie to Lee, no run the full ball follows the bouncer, Lee drives it back at Gillespie
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run
McMillan to Lee, 1 run width offered outside off stump, Lee cuts down to third man
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run full toss on middle stump, Hussey pushes it down to long-on for a single
McMillan to Lee, no run driven to mid-off on the front foot
McMillan to Lee, no run
McMillan to Lee, no run quicker ball angled into middle and leg stump, pushed back to the bowler

Gillespie to Hussey, FOUR runs Hussey gives him the charge and lofts it over midwicket, he's placed that beautifully and brings up his fifty with a four, another crucial innings when Australia had their backs to the wall.
Gillespie to Hussey, no run short ball and Hussey tries to pull again but doesn't connect

Gillespie to Hussey, (no ball) 1 run Gillespie oversteps and bowls a low full toss, Hussey plays it to mid-on and scampers through for the single, Lee dives valiantly to make his ground at the batsman's end
Gillespie to Bracken, no run picthes on a good length and moves away from Bracken who fends at it and gets beaten
Gillespie to Bracken, 2 runs fullish length on off stump, Bracken pushes it through covers on the front foot and times it well too, two runs
Gillespie to Bracken, 1 run short of a length ball on middle and leg stump, Bracken turns it around the corner for a single
McMillan to Bracken, no run full ball on off and middle, defended to midwicket
McMillan to Bracken, no run
McMillan to Bracken, no run Full ball on off stump, Bracken gets forward and plays it to point with an angled bat
McMillan to Bracken, no run Defended back to the bowler
McMillan to Bracken, 1 run Fullish length drifting on to the pads, whipped down to fine leg for a single
McMillan to Hussey, 1 run Full and in the blockhole, Hussey drives it down the ground to long off for asingle and retains strike
Astle to Hussey, 2 runs cut to deep point for two runs, Hussey is mercurial between the wickets
Astle to Hussey, 1 run whipped off his pads for a single to midwicket
Astle to Bracken, no run Pushed through quickly through the air, Bracken gets beaten outside the off stump
Astle to Bracken, 1 run whoops, Bracken tried to turn that through midwicket but closed the face early and got a leading edge, the ball lobbed safely on the off side
Astle to Hussey, 1 run pushed to midwicket for yet another single
Astle to Bracken, 3 runs poor line, full and down leg side, Bracken works that off his pads behind square for three precious runs
McMillan to Bracken, 2 runs short of a length outside off stump, Bracken slogs it over mid-off, he manages to clear the in field and gets two
McMillan to Bracken, no run defended on the front foot to cover
McMillan to Bracken, no run defended to point on the back foot
McMillan to Bracken, FOUR runs full, in the slot and Bracken gives it the treatment, he frees his arms and lofts it down to long on for four, just two needed now
McMillan to Hussey, no run McMillan bowls the bouncer down leg side, Hussey tries to pull it but misses, the New Zealanders appeal for a catch behind but the umpire says no
Astle to Clark, no run picthes on a good length in the channel outside off stump, Clark fishes at it and misses
Astle to Clark, no run fullish length angled into middle and leg, flicked off the pads to midwicket
Astle to Clark, 1 run worked to short fine leg and Hussey calls for the single, he's off in a flash and the single means that the scores are tied
Astle to Hussey, SIX runs short ball, Hussey rocks back and pulls handsomely over the square leg fence, Hussey finishes it in style

Thank you for tuning into Cricinfo's live coverage of today's game. We'll be back on Tuesday when England take on New Zealand at Adelaide. That will be a crucial match for New Zealand who haven't picked up any points so far. Do join us then. Cheers!

How many times have we seen Hussey do a Bevan now? His superb innings seals Australia's spot in the final. Credit to New Zealand for fighting as hard as they did. McMillan set the match up with a belligerent 89 but New Zealand could have done with a few more runs. Australia's chase started poorly - they lost their first three wickets for 17 but Clarke and Hussey played gritty innings to seal Australia's
Australia won by 2 wickets (with 8 balls remaining)
Player of the match is Michael Clarke, AUS
